name: Limos Lair Demo
description:
Limos Lair is a top-down Metroidvania about a lost creature of an unknown species, set on the path of discovering the mystery of this world and its own identity.

  •  Consume enemies in order to gain their abilities
  • Explore the world, unlock new paths and solve puzzles by using different acquired powers
  •  Find secrets and complete challenges

You can follow the game development updates on:

Facebook       Twitter

* The current build doesn't not contain music yet.

** For better performance it is recommended to download the .rar  file and launch the .exe from there.
